altTitles.th: จันทราเหนือหน้าผา

description.en:
I dared to fall in love with him.

A lone house perched on the cliff of a miserable little island, and the man who was dethroned and exiled there. I watched him on behalf of my sickly father... and I dared to fall in love with him. 

Without even knowing what my fate entailed.

---
There was a man who’s been dragged down from the throne and chased out to live on the edge of a cliff on a shabby island. I dared to fall in love with him. Sam Wol is woman who stands in for her sickly father at his post on a destitute island. Hwan is a man who’s been dragged down from the throne and chased out to live on the edge of a cliff on a shabby island. Some said that he committed adultery with his own mother and raped hundreds of maidens. “Hey child. How about we give a name to each other?” In my eyes, he’s only a lonely and attentive man. So, how could I not dare to love him?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
description.id:
Ada seorang pria yang diseret turun dari takhta dan diusir untuk tinggal di tepi tebing di sebuah pulau kumuh. Aku berani jatuh cinta padanya. Sam Wol adalah wanita yang menggantikan ayahnya yang sakit-sakitan di posnya di pulau miskin. Hwan adalah seorang pria yang telah diseret turun dari takhta dan diusir untuk tinggal di tepi tebing di sebuah pulau kumuh. Beberapa mengatakan bahwa dia melakukan perzinahan dengan ibunya sendiri dan memperkosa ratusan gadis. “Hei, Nak. Bagaimana kalau kita memberi nama satu sama lain?” Di mataku, dia hanya pria yang kesepian dan penuh perhatian. Jadi, bagaimana mungkin aku tidak berani mencintainya?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
description.ko:
왕위에서 끌어내려져, 초라한 섬의 절벽 끝자락으로 쫓겨난 남자.
나는 감히 그와 사랑에 빠지려 했다.

가난한 섬의 병든 아비를 대신하여 역을 서는 여자, 삼월.
왕위에서 끌어내려져, 초라한 섬의 절벽 끝자락으로 쫓겨난 남자, 환.

어떤 이들은 그가 친모와 간음을 하고, 수백의 처녀를 겁탈했다고 하지만,
"얘, 아가. 우리 서로 이름을 지어주지 않으련?"
내 눈앞의 그는 그저 외롭고 자상한 한 남자일 뿐이었다.

그러니 감히, 어떻게 그 남자를 사랑하지 않을 수 있었을까.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
description.th:
มีชายผู้หนึ่งถูกลากลงมาจากบัลลังก์และถูกขับไล่ให้ไปอาศัยอยู่ที่ขอบหน้าผาบนเกาะโทรมๆ ข้ากล้าที่จะตกหลุมรักเขา Sam Wol เป็นหญิงสาวที่ยืนหยัดเพื่อพ่อที่ป่วยของเธอในตำแหน่งของเขาบนเกาะที่ยากจน ฮวานเป็นชายที่ถูกลากลงมาจากบัลลังก์และถูกขับไล่ออกไปอาศัยอยู่บนขอบหน้าผาบนเกาะที่โทรม บางคนพูดว่าเขาล่วงประเวณีกับมารดาของตนและขืนใจหญิงสาวหลายร้อยคน “นี่เด็กน้อย เรามาตั้งชื่อให้กันดีหรือไม่?” แต่ในสายตาของข้า เขาเป็นเพียงชายขี้เหงาและเอาใจใส่ แล้วข้าจะไม่กล้ารักเขาได้อย่างไร

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
description.tr:
Sam Wol, yoksul bir adadaki görevinde hasta babasının yerine geçen bir kadındır. Hwan, tahttan indirilen ve eski püskü bir adada bir uçurumun kenarında yaşamak için tutsak edilen bir adamdır. Bazıları onun kendi annesiyle zina ettiğini ve yüzlerce genç kıza tecavüz ettiğini söyledi. "Hey çocuk. Birbirimize bir isim versek nasıl olur?” Benim gözümde o sadece yalnız ve dikkatli bir adam. Öyleyse onu sevmeye nasıl cesaret edemem.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
description.uk:
Був чоловік, якого скинули і вигнали на острів, щоб він жив у старій халупі на краю урвища. Я наважилася закохатися в нього.

Самволь – жінка, яка замінила свого болючого батька на посади на цьому знедоленому острові.
Ван - той чоловік, якого повалили та вислали на край урвища.

Дехто казав, що він чинив перелюб зі своєю матір'ю і зґвалтував сотні дівчат.
«Привіт, дитино. Як щодо того, щоб дати одне одному ім'я?»
У моїх очах він лише самотня і турботлива людина.

І як я могла не покохати його?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [R15](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002077), [R19](https://ridibooks.com/books/2968002059)

**Official English Translations:** [R15](https://manta.net/series/1421), [R19](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/moonrise-by-the-cliff-m)
